edge: The musical score for Mad Max: Fury Road was written by the Dutch composer Junkie XL.
The Dutch composer Junkie XL wrote the musical score for Mad Max: Fury Road.
A soundtrack album was released for Mad Max: Fury Road by WaterTower Music on May 12, 2015.
